response.overview: "KADALI" portrays the devastating aftermath of a husband's negligence and addiction, leading to the tragic loss of his wife and harming his son in a delusional state. Blurring reality with fiction from a book, he spirals deeper into substance abuse. The haunting song "Nanati Brathuku" underscores the theme of life's uncontrollable forces. The narrative serves as a cautionary tale, emphasizing the destructive nature of avoidance and the weight of consequences. Lacking remorse, the protagonist faces a grim reckoning, prompting reflection on the impact of choices.
response.title: Sea
